name: Suppressor Grenade
tooltip: Throws a grenade which explodes for <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_DamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> damage and leaves behid a goop that lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.count*duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds and slows attack and movement speed of enemies on it by <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_BuffSlow.modifiers[0].amount*(-1)"/>%.
